  # Description 
  this application automatically generates a random cocktail recipe
  # Table of Contents
  - [Description](#description)

  ## Installation
  To install dependencies run the following command <br>
  <code>npm i</code>
  <br>
  ## Usage
  Push the big red button to generate a cocktail

  <code>npm test</code>
